column1: How to change the car engine oil?
column2: "Remove the oil drain plug, drain the old oil, replace it with new oil and a filter, and ensure proper disposal of the used oil."

Here is a one-sentence summary of the text "How to change engine oil?":

Instructions on how to change the engine oil of a vehicle, typically involving draining the old oil, replacing the oil filter, and refilling with new oil.
